ADD.DE.summary: Adler ModemÃ¤rkte AG operates as a clothing retailer. It offers a range of products, including womenswear, menswear, and underwear; and accessories, footwear, kids wear and babywear, traditional dresses, and durable goods under the ADLER brand name, as well as under the external brands of Bexleys, Malva, Thea, MyOwn, Via Cortesa, Viventy by Bernd Berger, Steilmann, Senator, Eagle No.7, and Big Fashion. The company also operates specialist clothing stores together with other retailers. As of December 31, 2019, it operated 172 stores, including 143 stores in Germany, 24 stores in Austria, three stores in Luxembourg, and two stores in Switzerland, as well as an online shop. The company was founded in 1948 and is headquartered in Haibach, Germany. Adler ModemÃ¤rkte AG is a subsidiary of S&E Kapital GmbH.

ITXN.MX.summary: Industria de DiseÃ±o Textil, S.A. engages in the retail and online distribution of clothing, footwear, accessories, and household textile products through various commercial concepts. Its retail concepts include Zara, Pull & Bear, Massimo Dutti, Bershka, Stradivarius, Oysho, Zara Home, and UterqÃ¼e. The company operates 7,469 stores in 96 markets; and online stores in 202 markets. It is also involved in textile manufacturing, design, financial services, real estate, logistics, insurance, and combined heat and power plant, and construction businesses. The company operates in Spain, rest of Europe, the Americas, Asia, and internationally. Industria de DiseÃ±o Textil, S.A. was founded in 1963 and is based in Corunna, Spain.
